title: New: Rhye – The Fall
content: Illusive LA based duo Rhye caused quite a stir earlier in the year with their debut track Open, an R’n’B ballad with more than a touch of 60’s soul about it. Having now signed to Polydor for their debut EP, entitled The Fall, out 9 October, the title track from said release premiered on Pitchfork this afternoon. More upbeat than Open, The Fall is unashamedly pop, and as slick as a Lana Del Rey H&M advert, with every vocal twist and violin line carefully considered, ensuring no details go amiss. Check out The Fall below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
